name: bodysong
lyric:
Bodysong 身体歌

Why can we see with our eyes

Why can we hear with our ears

Why can we speak with our mouth

Why can we smell with our nose

Why can we write with our hands

Why can we walk with our legs

Why why why
Will you tell me why

Why can we see with our eyes

Why can we hear with our ears

Why can we speak with our mouth

Why can we smell with our nose

Why can we write with our hands

Why can we walk with our legs

Why why why

Will you tell me why
